channel.title: [DEVO 2.7]A Few Things (No Flame Please, Just Started With Devo..)
channel.description:
1. 2012's weapon interfaces, how do I make them work with the server? 2. Adding Quests, how? 3. Reducing lag, how? 4. Are there skills already in the server, or do I have to add them? 5. How do I remove thread per client? 6. Is there anything to convert in Event manager to use it with Devo?
Will update as I go.

item.title: [DEVO 2.7]A Few Things (No Flame Please, Just Started With Devo..)
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

!Joshua:

Which Devo? Because Killamess decided to copy it’s name…which was rediculous, but do youmean Killamess’s combat version or Bakatool’s original Devolution?

He specifically stated Devolution 2.7 in his thread title, therefore we can infer that it is Killamess’s.

Now iTang specifically for numbers; 1,3,5,6 there are tutorials and I encourage you to find them, as you will learn alot when you search these forums. You’ll find other tutorials, other posts, other problems, and you will learn from others experiences.

Now if you look through the server folders, you will see a folder: “skills” that will help you understand what skills are already in the server. And if you look through the folders, you’ll see a folder called “quests” work with that, it will show you how quests are added.

If you need guidance, we are here for you, but we expect you to take some initative first. Need more help, just tell me.

Read full topic
item.source: [DEVO 2.7]A Few Things (No Flame Please, Just Started With Devo..)
